document.docAuthor: Alves, Philippe V., Vieira, Fabiano M., Santos, Cláudia P., Scholz, Tomáš & Luque, José L.
document.masterDocTitle: A Checklist of the Aspidogastrea (Platyhelminthes: Trematoda) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A Checklist of the Aspidogastrea (Platyhelminthes: Trematoda) of the World

bibRefCitation.author: Dayal
bibRefCitation.refString: Dayal, J. (1943) On a new trematode, Aspidogaster indicum n. sp., from the intestine of a freshwater fish Barbus tor (Ham.). Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of India, 13, 20 - 24.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Limnoperna fortunei
(Bivalvia); freshwater; pericardial and renal cavities; PAL; China (Asia) (Tang & Tang

Megalobrama terminalis
(Actinopterygii); freshwater; intestine; PAL; China (Asia) (
Tang & Tang 1980
;

Pan et al . 1990
; Zhang et al . 1999 ).

Squaliobarbus curriculus
(Actinopterygii); freshwater; intestine; PAL; China (Asia) (
Tang & Tang 1980
;
Pan et al . 1990
; Zhang et al . 1999 ).

Remark: Type host;
Rai ( 1964 )
experimentally infected the Indian molluscs
Corbicula striatella
,
Lamellidens corrianus
,
Parreysia corrugata
and
Radiatula caerulea
.

bibRefCitation.author: Diesing
bibRefCitation.refString: Diesing, K. M. (1835) Aspidogaster limacoides, eine neue Art Binnenwurm, beschrieben und durch eine Abbildung erlautert. Medicinishe Jahrbucher des K. - K. osterreichischen Staates, Wien, 16, 420 - 430.

subSubSection.paragraph:

;

).

Remark: Sequence of partial 18 S, ITS- 1 , 5.8S , ITS- 2 and partial 28 S in the GenBank database
DQ 345319
(
Chen et al . 2010
).

Remark:
Diesing ( 1835 )
described
A . limacoides
from this host and
Leuciscus leuciscus
.

Radix balthica
(Gastropoda); freshwater; visceral mass; PAL; Bosnia and Herzegovina (Europe) (
Rozman 1972
).

Rutilus heckelii
(Actinopterygii); brackish, freshwater; intestine; PAL; Ukraine (Europe) (
Koval 1950
; Dolffus 1959 ).

sp. (Bivalvia); brackish; pericardial cavity; PAL; Russia (Europe) (

).

Barbus

).
